snippet.title: My Uncle Merlin - Kickstarter Video HD
snippet.description:
Our Kickstarter campaign is live!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pocketmana/1200683030?ref=394101&token=d4772327

You can try the demo right here:
http://myunclemerlin.com/MyUncleMerlinDemo.zip

My uncle Merlin is an upcoming interactive adventure regarding wizards in space. 

It is a tale of a young man, his uncle, and their unconventional journey through the vast unknown, on an unrelenting, dragon-propelled wizardly tower. 

Site: http://www.myunclemerlin.com
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pocketmana
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pocketmana
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pocketmana
